hadMessage(UUID) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Common.Network.RMIConnection
tells if there are messages for the client
hadMessage(UUID) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Network.RMIServer
allow the client to know if there are messages available for him.
handleActionEffect(Player, Action, Effect, JsonValue) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.ActionHandler
method used to handle ACTION effect action, i.e. action triggered by the activation of an effect which allow to make another action without placing a family member.
handleASKACT(GameMessage, JsonObject) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.MessageHandler
process ASKACT messages, building the action from the message and then passing it to the moveChecker, if the action is valid it is finally applied to the real state of the game
handleASKLDRACT(GameMessage, JsonObject) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.MessageHandler
process ASKLDRACT messages, appling the correct logic based on the choose of the client
handleCouncil(Player, Action) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.ActionHandler
method used to handle COUNCIL action. this method open a context on the client screen to allow the player to choose what resources he want gain from his council privilege. after the response has been received the method finally apply the change
handleHarvest(boolean, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.CLI.ClientActionEffectHandler
 
handleHarvest(Player, Action) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.ActionHandler
method used to handle HARVEST action. this method add the bonus of the bonus tile of the player and then apply all the permanent effects of TERRITORY cards owned by the player.
handleMarket(Player, Action) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.ActionHandler
method used to handle MARKET action. if the action has been performed on the action space with ID 3 of the market region, a context is open on the client screen to allow the player choose the resources he wants gain from his two council privilges
handleMessage(GameMessage) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.MessageHandler
given a message, based on its opcode, call the correct routine to process that message
handleProduction(boolean, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.CLI.ClientActionEffectHandler
 
handleProduction(Player, Action) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.ActionHandler
method used to handle PRODUCTION action. this method add the bonus of the bonus tile of the player and then apply all the permanent effects of BUILDING cards owned by the player.
handleTower(boolean, int, int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Client.CLI.ClientActionEffectHandler
 
handleTower(Player, Action) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.ActionHandler
method used to handle TOWER action. this method take the card from the board, add the permanent effect of CHARACHTER cards to the player list of effects and then apply the instant effect of the card taken, if the card has an ACTION effect handleActionEffect() is called
handleTRNEND(GameMessage) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.MessageHandler
process TRNEND messages, calling the correct routines of the TurnManager instance.
HarvestRegion - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board
represent the HarvestRegion of the board into which can be placed a FamilyMember and performed an HarvestAction.
HarvestRegion(int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Board.HarvestRegion
initialize this region with the given regionID, setting up the action spaces inside this region
hasATokenAbility() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Server.Game.Card.LeaderCard
 
hashCode() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.GC_32.Common.Game.ResourceSet
